Others: The Celtics made 29 of 61 threes in a game, making it impossible for the Knicks to compete.
The Knicks need to improve their three-point shooting, currently shooting only 30 threes compared to the Celtics' 29.
The Knicks must focus on getting to the free-throw line and denying shooters airspace on the catch.
The Celtics' defense exploited Karl-Anthony Towns' lack of elite foot-speed on the pick-and-roll.
The Knicks have a schematic route to victory by shooting more threes, getting to the line, and denying shooters airspace.
